name: Hit the Crab Puck
description:
Meet a Crab named Rio!

 
He was enjoying his life as a crab, but one day people caught him and started using him as a puck in an air hockey game... And you are one of these people!

Hit the Rio with your balloon and try to score him into your friends' goal! 

The game supports offline and online matches, so you can hit Rio even with your friend from far away!

(no crabs were harmed)

For a Better Resolution and Graphics We recommend you Downloading the Game! 

Controls:

Offline:

  • W - Move Player 1 Up
  • S - Move Player 1 Down
  • Arrow Key Up - Move Player 2 Up
  • Arrow Key Down - Move Player 2 Down
  • Escape - Leave to the Main Menu

Online:

  • W - Move Player  Up
  • S - Move Player  Down
  • Escape - Leave to the Main Menu

Important:

A weird glitch occurs sometimes in the online game mode, when for one player the map resets with the new score  whenever the player goals, but for the second player it's still the old score, if it happens leave the game and restart it. We are sorry for that bug 🪲

If there are other bugs we didn't notice, we are also sorry!
Also our hosting supports only 20 players in online at the same time, so if you can't connect, then it's probably because many people are playing online!
